name: Attuned_Command_of_the_Mastermind_C
display_name: Attuned Command of the Mastermind C
display_fullname: Boosts.Attuned Command of the Mastermind C
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}% . This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy, Damage and Increases Attack Rate
